overview:
Andreas Svensson is a Swedish born serial entrepreneur and founder of GuanxiVenture Media Lab with base in Bangkok, Thailand and Shanghai, China

Andreas have love and passion for media/publishing, locations, real time and social/community driven services.

In the last ten years Andreas moved around as consult for media, search engines, social networking, travel and real estate companies mainly in Asia but also in Europe.

Andreas grown up in south Sweden and study computer science and economy when decided to enter career working with inhouse startups within Bonnier a multi-platform media company with base in Sweden.
